game.name: Home Before Winter (HBW)
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Mobilize your troops and start your journey towards world domination. Get into the trenches and shoot incoming soldiers in this WW1 inspired shoot'em up, turn based, strategy game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mobilize your troops and start your journey towards world domination. Get into the trenches and shoot incoming soldiers in this WW1 inspired shoot'em up, turn based, strategy game.
